item.title: Jon's Garden Notes
item.description: This page is just for brainstorming ideas for Fammatre’s garden program. Communication Shared “todo” list. Website with notes and ideas. Maintenance Replace any rotting wood. Add screws for loose boards. Sand and paint Create an irrigation system map/plan. Repair irrigation system. Remove or repair broken tools and unneeded debris. Create an inventory of our equipment and supplies. Determine what equipment and supplies are needed. Create a map of our garden beds with descriptions of what is currently planted.
